description: Retrieve all chunks for a document and combine them into a single markdown content string

inputs.name: document_id
inputs.description: The ID of the document to combine chunks for

inputs.name: include_metadata
inputs.description: Whether to include chunk metadata in the output

inputs.name: separator
inputs.description: String to use as separator between chunks

outputs.name: content
outputs.description: The combined markdown content of all chunks

outputs.name: chunk_count
outputs.description: Number of chunks that were combined

outputs.name: document_info
outputs.description: Information about the document (name, type, etc.)

outputs.name: error
outputs.description: Error message if the operation failed
